EmailTemplate.subject: New Blog: APIs Are the Key to Digital-First Success
EmailTemplate.textOnly: APIs and digital transformation have been hot topics for some time. Especially when you consider that, by the year 2025, some 31 billion devices will be connected to and communicating with the internet (Internet of Things). It’s created an expectation for digital services to be always on, always available and always meeting consumers in the moment, which can feel impossible with inflexible legacy systems. But it is possible with APIs.
